string-array.item: Chicken Parmesan or Chicken Parmigiana are both the same delicious,\n mouth-watering dish that you know well and love. It\’s a breaded chicken cutlet with lots of melted mozzarella and/or provolone.\n Doesn\’t that make your stomach rumble?

Garlic Butter Shrimp Scampi is so quick and easy! A garlic buttery scampi sauce with a hint of white wine and lemon in less than 10 minutes!\n Serve as an appetizer/light meal OR for dinner with pasta!

Juicy chicken pieces and tender crisp broccoli are mixed with a homemade stir fry sauce\n to create a quick meal that the whole family will love! I love serving this chicken broccoli\n stir fry recipe over rice, but you can serve it over noodles if you\'d like, or even enjoy it on its own!

What is General Tso's chicken? This chicken dish is a popular Chinese entree made with
 fried chicken pieces coated in a sweet and slightly spicy sauce. This chicken is similar to
 sesame chicken, but the sauce has a little more heat and a more complex savory flavor.
 It is often served with a side of steamed broccoli.

A popular, traditional Peruvian dish, a stir fry that typically combines marinated\n strips of sirloin (or other beef steak) with onions, tomatoes, french fries, and other\n ingredients; and is typically served with rice.

Pineapple Fried Rice. Pineapple fried rice is a quick stir-fry with Thai-inspired ingredients like\n jasmine rice, curry, fish sauce, red bell pepper, pineapple, peas, and shrimp. This side dish is served\n up in an easy to make pineapple boat for an exotic touch.
